item.title: My Shiny Apps
item.description: recon : Really Convenient Spatial Data Search for locations by class or with a fuzzy name matching gazetteer. Deep Learning Image Classifier TensorFlow-powered image classification. North Korea Threat Finance Explorer A tool to facilitate access to DPRK sanctions data.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: body .main-container { max-width: 700px; } Hi, I’m Brendan. I’m interested in developing the data-driven insights required to fully enable decision makers. Topically, my primarily focus is national security issues. Considering the wildly interdisciplinary nature of such work, I am constantly exploring different fields. In the past, I worked as a security manager, combat medic, noncommissioned officer, linguist, and herder of cats. When I finally returned to formal academia, I developed a love for data analysis and programming.
